title: Has anybody else gotten a pinkish text saying we don't recognize these account details or something
body: (can't log-in like your account didn't exist) after having a thread removed from  the forums please?

replies.body:
Nothing on boards will influence anything in-game, and the post you had removed was just a broken guideline removal anyway.

Issues like that are usually connection related. There have been some server hiccups over the last couple days, so could be related, or could be something specific to your ISP or some such.

Likely it will resolve on it's won with a bit of time, but if it doesn't/hasn't, submit a ticket to player support and they can start looking at logs and traceroutes and stuff to determine what's going wrong and where.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

but the coincidence (next morning first log-in) is just derp, I'm still paranoid I pissed somebody in champ creation or staff off with cheap anti meta builds (e.g keeping Leblanc's spells lvl 1 and using her double jump to recharge static in under 10s)
You weren't the only one experiencing the same issue (just take a look at Help and Support).
